title: Cognitive Modeling and Problem-Solving Strategies Based on Botanical Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic plant biology terminology and understanding of biological classification systems
context.additional_context: Analysis of botanical application cases and decision-making skill enhancement for R&D department managers in enterprises.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the relationship between plant structures and functions with over 85% accuracy using visual maps.
Learners can construct cognitive models that systematically integrate complex botanical concepts using guided scaffolding and prompting techniques.
Learners can reduce cognitive load by over 30% during botanical problem-solving by utilizing spatial reasoning and working memory capacities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
